basics.summary: Marketing & SEO Expert with 6 years of experience. Master of crafting captivating campaigns and compelling content. Adept at front-end development and digital brand strategy. Ready to bring creative visions to life.

work.name: Raley's
work.summary: Manage large-scale email marketing campaigns using Salesforce Marketing Cloud, reaching over 1 million subscribers across six brands. Leverage HTML/CSS skills to create responsive, engaging email designs. Spearhead the content strategy and development for Food City's Mi Club loyalty program launch, creating a comprehensive 12-part email series and copy for multi-channel digital and print content plan. Wrote marketing copy tailored to primarily Hispanic customer-base, introducing the Mi Club program and its benefits while elevating Food City's brand positioning in competitive Arizona grocery landscape.

work.name: Raley's
work.summary: Wrote compelling copy for diverse channels including email, radio ads, in-store activations, e-commerce platforms, and social media. Led successful content migration from WordPress to Bloomreach for raleys.com, optimizing user experience and SEO performance. Developed and maintained comprehensive digital asset management system for menus and promotional graphics, ensuring brand consistency across all touchpoints.

work.name: Nowspeed
work.summary: Copywrote, created content, and developed brand strategies across paid and organic channels, including blogs, email, social media, and Google Ads. Collaborated closely with Bay Alarm Company to develop new website content, increasing organic clicks by 50,000 year-over-year through highly targeted content. Utilized HubSpot to create comprehensive buyer journeys and implement sales automation, contributing to a $5 million revenue increase from 2020 to 2021. Optimized landing pages using WordPress, SEO plugins, and page builders, resulting in a 10% increase in conversion rates. Leveraged data-driven insights from tools like Google Analytics, SpyFu, and Ahrefs to refine SEO strategies and identify new content opportunities.

Wrote grant proposal for medical technology SaaS submitted to the National Science Foundation in Summer 2018. Managed True Pitch, Inc. Facebook and Instagram. Maintained social post calendar. Automated workflow using Buffer. Created graphics using Canva.

_volunteer_disabled.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

_awards_disabled.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
_awards_disabled.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'

_publications_disabled.name: Zur Elektrody/namik bewegter Körper
_publications_disabled.summary: It concerned an interpretation of the Michelson–Morley experiment and the properties of light and time. Special relativity incorporates the principle that the speed of light is the same for all inertial observers regardless of the state of motion of the source.

_publications_disabled.name: Über einen die Erzeugung und Verwandlung des Lichtes betreffenden heuristischen Gesichtspunkt
_publications_disabled.summary: In the second paper, he applied the quantum theory to light to explain the photoelectric effect. In particular, he used the idea of light quanta (photons) to explain experimental results, but stressed the importance of the experimental results. The importance of his work on the photoelectric effect earned him the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1921.

_publications_disabled.name: Die Grundlage der allgemeinen Relativitätstheorie
_publications_disabled.summary: The publication of the theory of general relativity made him internationally famous. He was professor of physics at the universities of Zurich (1909–1911) and Prague (1911–1912), before he returned to ETH Zurich (1912–1914).

_projects_disabled.name: Quantum Computing
_projects_disabled.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
